channel.title: vacation on Fibro Hell
channel.description: Recent content in vacation on Fibro Hell

item.title: Vacations and the toll on the body
item.description: The wife is on vacation this week, and, since last week, she’s been trying to butter me up to go with her to the beach because she knows how painful these things can be for me, and I usually decline. We haven’t done something like this in a while, so we both wanted to do something. On Monday, we arrived a little before lunch so we could eat something and then chill in the sand for a while.
